hackathon-description-text: DiamondHacks is a hackathon geared towards female participants and other underrepresented genders in tech. What do we mean by that? As part of our mission to increase women and other underrepresented genders in tech, we welcome anyone who currently self-identifies, or has ever self-identified, as female, non-binary, or gender nonconforming.
hackathon-rules:
We abide by MLH's Code of Conduct: 
All teammates must be working in person for majority of the event and all code must be written during DiamondHacks.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device
Best Domain Name Registered from Domain.com

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2610 Cates Ave, Raleigh, NC 27606, USA
hackathon-description-header: Hackathon for underrepresented genders in tech.
hackathon-location-description: NC State University - Talley Student Union
